entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET Version: 6.0.1 Fatal Error Runtime at IP 00007FF696C3917B with exit code 80131506 (ExecutionEngineException?) #63127
  • Writing an efficient custom AsyncMethodBuilder is too hard #63125
  • Libraries tests 7.0 (master) cross build failed for tizen arm64 #63122
  • Remove workarounds for missing "parameterless struct" C# feature #63120
  • TcpListener.LocalEndPoint property should really be IPEndPoint, not EndPoint #63117
  • Difference in codegen of `string.IsNullOrEmpty()` #63116
  • Improve behavior of Accept when the listener is closed #63115
  • [Feature Request] :Tensor<T> support #63124
  • TcpListener should implement IDisposable #63114
  • [API Proposal]: Soft References #63113

Closed

  • Cache compaction will never start #59875
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Parse compiler version in init-compiler.sh #63126
    community-contribution
  • HostBuilder.Build doc: mention lifetime #63123
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Fix non-portable coreclr arm64 build #63121
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Update the apple testing doc #63119
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix setting the configuration parameter in the apple test runner #63102
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • [mono] Make some icalls return objects using an extra ObjectHandleOnS… #62141
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Improve inliner - static readonly fields, pinvokes, Span::Length #62421
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add optimization "X & 1 == 1" to "X & 1" (#61412) #62818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [API Implementation]: Expose `System.Drawing.Graphics.NativeGraphics`. #63058
    area-System.Drawing, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix a regression caused by 9ddd58a58d14a7bec5ed6eb777c6703c48a… #63084
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • 62606 Return fully qualified path from FileSystemEventArgs #63051
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Move `System.Drawing.Common` to `SafeHandle`s et. al. #63085
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] JIT/EE interface for getting ABI-info #62893
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • Remove ternary workaround for string.IsNullOrEmpty #63095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1525634 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
